sentences.english: The glitzy training centres are only the beginning.

sentences.english: Fourth, all sorts of pretexts to collect fees.

sentences.english: Some government departments try in a hundred and one ways to collect money by inventing different names.
sentences.chinese: 第二句說有些政府部門千方百計巧立名目來撈錢。
